heroSection.title:
Festival
Board of
heroSection.description: Everything you need to know about festivals in Roquetes is just a click away.

aboutSection.title: Who are we?
aboutSection.description: The Roquetes Festival Board is an independent, non-political, non-profit organization responsible for organizing festivals and events in the town of Roquetes, Tarragona. Here you can find all the information about upcoming events and much more.

wantToParticipateSection.title: Want to participate?
wantToParticipateSection.firstPar: There are many ways to help and participate in organizing festivals and events throughout the year.
wantToParticipateSection.secondPar: You can participate by becoming a member of the association and enjoying all the year's events, including entry to the town's major festivals each year.
wantToParticipateSection.thirdPar: If you have a group of friends, you can also participate by registering as a crew in the crew contest held every year.
wantToParticipateSection.linksPar: Click here to see the requirements to participate in the crew contest or here to register as a member.

underConstruction.title: Page Under Construction
underConstruction.weAreWorking: This page is not available yet. Please check back later.
underConstruction.askUs: If you have any questions, feel free to contact us.
